ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Quest] EQ bugs
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a cheats list so his question is not wrong and doesn t call for sarcasm. I don t know any cheats. Fastest way to level is to make a necro and solo in
ygData.messageBody:
This is a cheats list so his question is not wrong and doesn't call for sarcasm.

I don't know any cheats. Fastest way to level is to make a necro and solo in the
right places. Even faster is it to buy an account from someone that has a lvl
50+ char


>
> > There is that one bug where you kill a bunch of monsters and get exp,
> other
